SELECT product.product_id, shop_product.shop_product_id, product.status AS product_status, shop_product.status AS shop_product_status, brand.english_name AS brand_name, vendor.vendor_name AS boutique, product.product_code AS boutique_id, product.season_code AS season_code, product.cover_img, product.description_img, product.category_id,
view_prod_store_sum.store AS totalStore,
product.designer_id AS designer_id, product.color_code AS color_code FROM product LEFT JOIN shop_product ON shop_product.shop_id = 65 AND shop_product.enabled = TRUE AND shop_product.product_id = product.product_id INNER JOIN vendor ON product.vendor_id = vendor.vendor_id AND product.enabled = TRUE INNER JOIN brand ON brand.brand_id = product.brand_id AND brand.enabled = TRUE
INNER JOIN view_prod_store_sum ON view_prod_store_sum.product_id = product.product_id
WHERE
product.status IN (4,2)
product.status = #{status}
AND shop_product.status IS NULL
AND shop_product.status = #{shopStatus}
AND view_prod_store_sum.store > 0
AND view_prod_store_sum.store <= 0
AND brand.brand_id = #{brandId}
AND product.category_id IN
#{item}
AND product.season_code = #{season}
AND product.product_code = #{boutiqueId}
AND vendor.vendor_id = #{vendorId}
AND (product.cover_img IS NOT NULL AND product.description_img != NULL )
AND (product.cover_img IS NULL OR product.description_img IS NULL )
AND product.img_modified = 1
AND product.img_modified = 0
AND product.designer_id LIKE "%"#{designerId}"%"
AND product.color_code = #{colorCode}
ORDER BY
vendor.vendor_name
product.product_code
product.season_code
CONCAT(product.designer_id, product.color_code)
product.product_id
DESC
LIMIT #{start}, #{count};

SELECT product.product_id, product.status AS product_status, shop_product.status AS shop_product_status FROM product LEFT JOIN shop_product ON product.product_id = shop_product.product_id AND shop_product.shop_id = 65 AND shop_product.enabled = 1 WHERE product.product_id = #{product_id} AND product.enabled = TRUE;

SELECT product.status AS product_status, shop_product.status AS shop_product_status, COUNT(product.status) AS count FROM product LEFT JOIN shop_product ON shop_product.product_id = product.product_id AND shop_product.enabled = TRUE
INNER JOIN brand ON brand.brand_id = product.brand_id AND brand.enabled = TRUE
INNER JOIN vendor ON product.vendor_id = vendor.vendor_id AND product.enabled = TRUE
WHERE product.enabled = TRUE
AND view_prod_store_sum.store > 0
AND view_prod_store_sum.store <= 0
AND brand.brand_id = #{brandId}
AND product.category_id IN
#{item}
AND product.season_code = #{season}
AND product.product_code = #{boutiqueId}
AND vendor.vendor_id = #{vendorId}
AND (product.cover_img IS NOT NULL AND product.description_img != NULL )
AND (product.cover_img IS NULL OR product.description_img IS NULL )
AND product.img_modified = 1
AND product.img_modified = 0
AND product.designer_id LIKE "%"#{designerId}"%"
AND product.color_code = #{colorCode}
ORDER BY
vendor.vendor_name
product.product_code
product.season_code
CONCAT(product.designer_id, product.color_code)
product.product_id
DESC
GROUP BY product.status, shop_product.status;
